name: One Sex Night
description:
“ONE SEX NIGHT” is our new Point And Click game, where you must survive the night. With awesome 3D animation, this is a must play!

You will have to survive one night, taking care of the old mansion of the city. The sensual spirit of a clow will attack you all night long.
You must manage your skills wisely if you want to survive. Or maybe let her to catch you...



What you can find in the game:
• A challenging enemy that wants to catch you.
• Beautiful pictures and animations. 4 Scenes and 6 loop animations.
• Incredible sound and visual effects.
